SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I.  A desert place.
STAGEDIR: Thunder and lightning. Enter three Witches

SPEECH.SPEAKER: First Witch
LINE: When shall we three meet again
In thunder, lightning, or in rain?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Second Witch
LINE: When the battle's lost and won.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Third Witch
SPEECH.LINE: That will be ere the set of sun.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ALL
LINE: Fair is foul, and foul is fair:
Hover through the fog and filthy air.
